name: Lime-White Chocolate Cheesecake Pie
author: tigershoes
summary: This lime-white chocolate pie is sooooo good, a family favorite! No baking required. It's so simple. Gotta try it!
ingredients: 2 ½ cups heavy whipping cream, divided
directions: Combine gingersnaps, butter, and sugar in a large bowl
Press onto the bottom and 1 inch up the sides of a greased 9-inch springform pan
Sprinkle gelatin over lime juice in a microwave-safe dish
Microwave on high power for about 20 seconds
Combine 1/2 cup heavy cream and chocolate in a large microwave-safe bowl
Melt in 15-second intervals, stirring after each interval, 1 to 3 minutes
Stir dissolved gelatin into the melted chocolate
Beat cream cheese and sugar in a large bowl until smooth
Gradually add chocolate mixture and lime zest; mix well
Beat remaining heavy cream in another large bowl until stiff peaks form
Gently fold in cream cheese mixture
Cover and refrigerate until set, 8 hours to overnight
